divs: Sighting Detailshuge transparent except for the outer edges pulsating movement and 3 light blue lights. front was triangle shaped with the blue light right in middle and on the left and right side was a blue light and then the back on as far as I could see couldn't see just a huge rectangle shaped body with no end that I could see. seemed very very low to the ground and I could see clouds, stars and stuff through it.
Summary: extremly large transparent craft, could only see the outline, stars, etc on the inside. very low to the ground couldn't see the end. slowly moved as if pulsating. We talked about it for a couple hours then it was sort of unimportant??? . of "forgotten"
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around September 30th 1998
